entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
